page.title: 14The Conon Cold Store
page.content: The Conon Cold Store Ltd is the largest employment in this area,giving work to eighty people.The main function of the firm is the primary processing of white fish,mainly Haddock and Cod and pelagic fish,these being Herring and Mackerel.Primary processing is the basic cleaning and filleting of the fish,and there after they are frozen for selling to manufacturers of Fish Fingers,Cod steaks and other fish products.The offal is also frozen and sold to manufacturers who turn this into mink food.The fish processed in the Conon Cold Store mainly come from Peterhead and Kinlochewe , with smaller quantities being brought in from Wick and Mallaig.The species of fish processed is seasonal and can be roughly divided thus :Cod in the early part of the year,haddock and whiting
